name: Vulpes Ruber
description:
In the VR world of Vulpes Ruber you are a snowman fighting your life against the Fox horde who will just want to see you melt. Make your stand armed with your sole weapon, snowballs.

Vulpes Ruber is a game created for #ue4jam Winter 2018. It is a VR title, created for Oculus Rift and developed on Unreal Engine v 4.18.

Control scheme:

There are two modes in this game.

Overhead view - Point anywhere on the map and use the face buttons to move the snowman.

The direction the snowman is facing can be adjusted with the thumbstick

Click on the thumbstick to switch between the two modes

Fighting mode

Grab Trigger: Create and hold a snowball

Throw the snowball by releasing the grab button

For a longer throw hold down A button while throwing

For a shorter throw hold down B button while throwing

To go back to the overhead view and move the snowman, simply press the thumstick button again.
